subject: Fix mobile web scrolling and auto-scroll behavior in chat view
body:
- Fix auto-scroll when loading older messages: Track message count to only auto-scroll when new messages arrive, not when paginating to older messages
- Improve mobile web scrolling: Remove pan and tap gestures on web to prevent conflicts with native scrolling and accidental action triggers
- Use long-press only on mobile web to open message action sheet, avoiding unintended actions from quick taps
- Native platforms retain tap, long-press, and swipe-to-reply gestures
title: Fix mobile web scrolling and auto-scroll behavior in chat view
